mapper.select: SELECT bom.`id` AS id, bom.`serialno` AS bomSerialno, bom.`name` AS bomName, dict.`name` AS typeName, dict.`id` AS typeId, bom.`version` AS version, bom.`materiel_id` AS materielId, material.serial_no AS materialSerialNo, material.name AS materialName, material.specification AS specification, unituom.id AS unitUomId, unituom.name AS unitUomName, bom.`count` AS bomCount, bom.`image_no` AS imageNo, bom.`create_by` AS createrId, createuser.`name` AS createrName, bom.`auditor` AS auditorId, audituser.`name` AS auditorName, bom.`use_status` AS status, bom.`remarks` AS remarks, bom.`audit_sign` AS auditSignId, dics.`name` AS auditSignName FROM mes_bom bom LEFT JOIN cus_materiel material ON material.`id`=bom.`materiel_id` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary unituom ON unituom.id = material.`unit_uom` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dics ON dics.id = bom.`audit_sign` LEFT JOIN sys_user createuser ON createuser.`user_id`=bom.`create_by` LEFT JOIN sys_user audituser ON audituser.`user_id`=bom.`auditor` LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary dict ON dict.`id` = bom.`type` WHERE bom.id = #{value}
